resources.string: Downloaded app disabled in Safe mode
Touch & hold to pick up a widget
Double-tap & hold to pick up a widget or use custom actions
Touch & hold to pick up a shortcut.
Double-tap & hold to pick up a shortcut or use custom actions.
No more room on the home screen
No more room in the dock
Allows an app to add shortcuts without user intervention
Read home screen settings and shortcuts
Allows the app to read home screen settings and shortcuts
Write home screen settings and shortcuts
Allows the app to modify home screen settings and shortcuts
%1$s is not allowed to make phone calls
This is a system app and can\'t be uninstalled
To show Notification Dots, turn on app notifications for %1$s
Automatically add shortcuts to newly installed apps to the desktop
The app for this icon isn\'t installed. You can remove the shortcut, or search for the app and install it manually.
Each work app has a badge and is kept secure by your organization. Move apps to your Home screen for easier access.
Remember to put on your sunscreen, and drink plenty of water!
Remember to drink some coffee and don\'t drive while fatigued
It\'s going to be cloudy today
Remember to take your bug spray!
Take an umbrella, and drive slowly in slippery areas!
Slippery roads and low visibility don\'t go together.
Watch out for lightning, and if you are in the outside, don\'t hide under a tree
Put on a mask, watch out for low visibility, and frail family members should stay inside.
Snow and ice can make your day a very miserable one. Watch out for slippery roads when walking and driving, and make sure to keep warm
You can specify an alternate Chromium-family browser
the Great Hall of the People
You can swipe from the left of the home screen for the feed
Cows and fishes join together and win water fight at the command of our Supreme Leader who just happened to edit this issue of Pravda

Just as the majestic Pyongyang Grand Mass Gymnastics ended, the great leader, our Supreme Leader, Kim \'Fatty the Third\' Jong-un used his expert diplomatic skills to organize the Cows and the Fishes together against the closing Imperialist forces...
You can add more feed providers or come back later
This will hide the status bar clock from your home screen and recents menu
North Korea, DPRK, Miniluv, Minitrue, Miniplenty, Minipeace, Great Leader, Great Leader, Great Leader, Great Leader
Do not Disturb –– All events blocked
Blur the background of cards and turn the text white
When enabled, ongoing events will be shown in the system calendar provider
Your feed will inform you throughout the day
Your feed is the place where you can find the information that you need, when you need it most. The feed will display upcoming calender events, news and more.
Calendar events will be tinted by the colour of the calendar
If turned on, a tab will be shown containing all cards that cannot be categorized. Not all tabbing providers will work with this.
The toolbar will be automatically hidden when scrolling through the feed
Tabs and menu items will be displayed at the bottom of the screen
This feed appears to have been accessed from multiple applications, which is not recommended and may leave your launcher in an unknown state, and now needs to be restarted.
Librechair is compatible with plugins designed for the Shade launcher.
This note must have a title and message
The daily forecast will be displayed in horizontal rows
The hourly forecast will be displayed as horizontal rows
A back to top button will be displayed when scrolling down
You can set an image to be used as the background of the feed
This increases tab visibility by placing a partially opaque background behind it
This exports the current background image
The weather card will be raised
Display tab items as single line
Tabs will be displayed with icons and text in the same line
Tab titles will not be displayed
Librechair will attempt to apply the set theme to the widget
Use home widget as toolbar widget
The title bar widget will be replaced by the home widget
Tabs without active feed providers will be hidden
This option is not available with all background image providers
Show background image description if available
Chips will be displayed at the top of the title bar
Chips will be displayed with a MDC outlined background
Chips will be mixed before they are displayed
Use background image as background for overlay views
The feed background will be used as the background for overlay views
Only available with a background image provider
JavaScript will be enabled in the search screen
Actions will be displayed in a drop-down menu, instead of as separate icons
Attempt to block trackers and advertisments
Librechair will attempt to block trackers and advertisements in web pages opened in the feed
Links will directly be opened in the browser if applicable
The feed will refresh less frequently
The feed can be refreshed by pulling down
Use Gecko rendering engine for web pages
The Mozilla Gecko rendering engine will be used to open web pages in the feed
Send article notification on initial load
Article notifications will be sent even when they are first loaded
A more minimal card will be used for news items
Actions will be hidden (certain functionality will be missing)
Notifications will be displayed for new articles
An analog clock will be displayed in the world clock provider
Card corners will be rendered in the selected style
Use compact card for the chip card provider
This hides the header cards in the image provider, which can be used to add or modify images
Google Safe Browsing allows for a more secure web browsing experience by marking and blocking malicious websites. Your browsing history is not sent to Google.
The spring effect will be disabled
The article could not be loaded due to a network error
Show article title when sharing articles
The article title will be prepended to the URL
Whether or not to display unread indicators in tabs
Librechair will attempt to resolve all redirects prior to sharing an article
The amount of unread providers will be displayed in the unread indicators
